sqlMap.statement: SELECT M.MDSE_CD ,M.RCV_SER_TAKE_FLG ,M.SHPG_SER_TAKE_FLG ,SR.LG_SER_NUM ,SR.FROM_SER_NUM ,SR.THRU_SER_NUM ,M.INSTL_BASE_CTRL_FLG FROM MDSE M , MDSE_SER_NUM_RNG SR WHERE M.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND M.MDSE_CD = #mdseCd# AND M.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND M.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SR.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND M.MDSE_CD = SR.MDSE_CD (+) AND SR.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'

SELECT MM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK , MM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_STS_CD , MM.CUR_LOC_NUM , MM.CUR_LOC_ACCT_NUM , MM.SVC_MACH_MAINT_AVAL_FLG , MM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_LOC_STS_CD FROM SVC_MACH_MSTR MM WHERE MM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MM.MDSE_CD = #mdseCd# AND MM.SER_NUM = #serNum# AND MM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
